mapper.insert: insert into return_order_contact_info( return_order_id, cntct_name, cntct_mobile, cntct_country, cntct_state, cntct_city, cntct_town, cntct_street, cntct_address, cntct_post_code, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{returnOrderId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cntctName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntctMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntctCountry, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntctState, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntctCity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntctTown, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntctStreet, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntctAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntctPostCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

where return_order_id = #{returnOrderId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
